thread.title: The Essential Guide to Hialeah Restaurants
thread.title_full: The Essential Guide to Hialeah Restaurants

author: Eater Staff
title: The Essential Guide to Hialeah Restaurants
text:
The Essential Guide to Hialeah Restaurants All Feb 16, 2017, 10:00am EST El Rinconcito Peruano 
Hialeah: you’re either from there, have heard the name referenced in one of Pitbull’s raps, or have no idea where it is due to its far-out-west location. 
Whether you know it or not, there’s much to love about the city of progress, starting with these ten essential restaurants listed for you in alphabetical order . 
– Suanny Garcia Barales 1 Don Camarón 
The ideal spot for a good meal and a good time. Must-have items on the menu include the finger-licking camaron a la francesa (shrimp in a parmesan cream sauce, served with Hawaiian plantains), salmon cilantro, and the traditional seafood rice dish, paella. Stop by the outside bar for happy hour and light bites with occasional live music. Yelp
